full_description:
Epson EB-2250U 5000 Lumens 3LCD WUXGA Projector

The Epson EB-2250U 5000 Lumens 3LCD WUXGA Projector is intended to provide superior picture quality and adaptability for professional presentations and educational settings. It has Epson's 3LCD technology, which produces true-to-life colors and crisp Full HD resolution, guaranteeing that every piece of your material is presented clearly and precisely. Its exceptional brightness of 5,000 lumens keeps presentations clear and lively even in brightly lit areas, making it ideal for use in conference rooms, schools, and bigger arenas. This projector has several connecting options to support a variety of devices and configurations. It has two HDMI connections that enable for smooth connection to several sources at the same time, making it simple to transition between presentations and entertainment. The Epson EB-2250U enhances cooperation and engagement by supporting split-screen capabilities, which allows two separate sources to be displayed side by side. Multi-PC projection enables numerous users to connect their devices to the projector at the same time, allowing for dynamic group discussions and collaborative work sessions. The Gesture Presenter feature distinguishes the Epson EB-2250U by allowing users to operate the projector with simple hand movements. The projector is designed for ease of use and dependability, with a variety of installation choices, including ceiling mounting and table positioning, to accommodate diverse room designs and preferences. Its low-maintenance design, including long-lasting lamp life and simple access to filters, offers less downtime and a lower total cost of ownership.

Simple Setup and Connectivity

The EB-2250U has several networking options, including screen mirroring, wireless LAN (optional), and two HDMI ports. Setup is very simple, due to features like as auto-power-on, focus aid, keystone correction, and screen fit, which allow for rapid and effective presentation delivery.

Value-added flexibility

The Multi-PC projection software that comes with the EB-2250U allows you to connect up to 50 PCs and divide the screen for split screen projection, making it significantly more cost-effective and flexible than a flat-panel display.

full_description:
Epson EB-1485FI 5000 Lumens Full HD Laser Ultra Short Throw Interactive Projector

The Epson EB-1485FI 5000 Lumens Full HD Laser Ultra Short Throw Interactive Projector connects people, technology and ideas into a seamless digital experience, facilitating better communication by turning any whiteboard or flat surface into an interactive area. Featuring Full HD WUXGA resolution, a clearly readable display up to 100", plus up to 4,400 lumens of colour brightness and 4,400 lumens of white brightness1, this touch-enabled solution supports impactful presentations. Just turn it on and write your ideas or agenda. Display and annotate content using a finger touch or gesture.

Up to 3x Brighter with Epson Projectors

The Epson EB-1485FI uses 3LCD Engines that have no colour wheel with a white segment and therefore don't force a tradeoff between white and colour brightness. In fact, Epson projectors have up to 3x Brighter Colours than their leading competitive 1-chip DLP projectors. If you are looking for business and education projectors or 720p home entertainment projectors, know that choosing Epson projectors means up to 3x brighter colours. If you are looking for 1080p home entertainment projectors, you consistently get 2x and up to 3x Brighter Colours than competitor 1-chip DLP projectors.

Multi-PC Projection

Epson's Multi-PC utility with Moderator device management software allows you to simultaneously display up to four devices on the screen over a network (wired or wireless), with even more users connected to the same interactive display on Standby Mode. The moderator can drag and drop participants into or out of the four quadrants and control which device screens to display.

The Epson EB-1485FI comes with 2 years Parts & Service warranty /Lamp:1000hrs Warranty.
